article.title: Is Change Changing You?
article.author: Kent Schneider
article.abstract: Constant reorganizations and realignments occur in every government and every alliance. A major study is ongoing in NATO to determine the alliance's direction. In the United States, the creation of the new joint CyberCommand and the Air Forces' new Global Strike Command are recent examples of significant change.
article.text:
Constant reorganizations and realignments occur in every government and every alliance. A major study is ongoing in NATO to determine the alliance's direction. In the United States, the creation of the new joint Cyber Command and the Air Force's new Global Strike Command are recent examples of significant change.
Many who are directly affected by such changes have worked with governments to facilitate the efforts. With that in mind: What lessons have been learned by those of you who have been impacted by the changing environment that we are all doing business in?
How have the latest round of Base Realignments and Closure decisions impacted you? What major changes do you see for the future?
